channel.title: Mohammad Abdullah Matin Khan on SBMARUF
channel.description: Recent content in Mohammad Abdullah Matin Khan on SBMARUF

item.title: xCodeEval: A Large Scale Multilingual Multitask Benchmark for Code Understanding, Generation, Translation and Retrieval
item.description: We introduce xCodeEval, the largest executable multilingual multitask benchmark to date consisting of 25M document-level coding examples from about 7.5 K unique problems covering up to 17 programming languages with execution-level parallelism.
